name: CherokeeNationNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Listen to daily updates from Cherokee Nation News and get all relevant info on your Alexa device. You can just say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing". You can say "Alexa, stop" to exit anytime.
